item.title: Parking bay signage removed, 11th September
item.description:
The parking bay signage has been removed (maybe on purpose). There were two signs with the parking regulations etc. Also someone has removed the one way sign off the pole on the other side of the road by the church at the entrance to Albany Road. Again, people have been parking facing the wrong way and driving the wrong way.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Albany Road, Chislehurst, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Faded white painted arrows, 11th September
item.description:

item.title: Rubbish strewn across path from ripped bin bags, 11th September
item.description:
